page.title: 02A Boy's Weekend
page.content: Over the weekend you can go to{Out {of This World.}Inside is a ball pen which is a big cage with thousands of plastic balls to jump in.There are machines to sit inside and steer a racing car round a track.Also there is a disco where you can programme what song you want.On the top floor there is a big tube that goes down to the ground floor.As you get to the middle it goes pitch black for about 10 seconds.All it is really is a big slide.You can't see through the tube. On Sundays you can play{snooker}at the Silverhill club.They have 2 full size Snooker tables.Also at the Silverhill club you can play pool. Also on Sundays you can play{football} for St Vincents or any other Junior League team.Lots of boys play on t heir{bikes. }
